cab.content: SECRET62(THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HER BRITANNIC MAJEST Y'S GOVERNMENT)COPY NO. /CABINETSOVIET union note by the Secretary of Statefor Foreign AffairsFollowing the discussion at Cabinet this morning(C.C(58) 8th Conclusions, Minute 4) I invite the attention ofmy colleagues to the revised draft of the reply to Mr. Bulganinand my covering telegram to the Prime Minister which arebeing circulated to the Cabinet as Track Nos. 124 and 125.S.L.Foreign Office, S.W.I.22nd January, 1958Ce(58) 1622nd January, 1958
